lead_paragraph: A federal monitor overseeing a desegregation agreement requiring Westchester County to build 750 units of affordable housing wants outside analysis.

headline.print_headline: Fight on ’09 Housing Pact:  Did Westchester Honor It?
headline.main: Dispute as Westchester Housing Pact Nears End: Did the County Honor It?

snippet: A federal monitor overseeing a desegregation agreement requiring Westchester County to build 750 units of affordable housing wants outside analysis....
abstract: Legal battle continues over whether Westchester County, NY, has made good on its obligations under 2009 federal consent decree regarding fair and affordable housing; hearing is scheduled to explore recommendations of James E Johnson, federal monitor in case.
